I wanted to try another source of randomisation, thus the genre naming of "draw-and-draw". It was also a chance to push myself to avoid my usual game design instincts towards creating strictly contained, interlocking economic systems. Not everything has to be a Eurogame!
Hope you check it out. Leave a comment on Itch, or
